sentences.english: We're all waiting. ' Maybe she also thinks that I am snobby .
sentences.chinese: 我们都在等，她可能也觉得我臭跩。

sentences.english: If one knows what he lives for, he can bear all kinds of life.
sentences.chinese: 跩罭一个人知道为什么而活，就可以忍受任何种生活。

sentences.english: He's the snippy guy who decides who goes on the platform to dance.
sentences.chinese: 他就是那个决定谁可以上台跳舞的跩家伙。

sentences.english: The stout old man waddled across the road.
sentences.chinese: 那肥胖的老人一跩一跩地穿过马路。

sentences.english: The stout old man waddled across the road.
sentences.chinese: 那肥胖的老人一跩一跩地穿过马路。

definition: household dish, implement or furniture/domestic animal/(coll.) guy/chap/weapon
(dialect) hen/prostitute/(Tw) interfering/nosy/busybody (from Taiwanese 家婆, Tai-lo pr. [ke-pô])
stinking pretension/to give oneself airs and offend others/hateful arrogance
hard to deal with/hard to get along with
variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
to put one's hands on one's hips
to bend in two so as to break/to defy/to disobey/also pr. [ao3]
